name: Optional Karmotrine
description:
This is a fan-game utilizing the VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action universe, created by Sukeban Games. We do not own the source material. This project was made to present new ideas, and expand on existing ones in VA-11 HALL-A. We hope you enjoy this game!

  • Story: ky-1e
  • Art & Program: gotuya
  • Music: สันติ

  • พี่อิส for a banner ขอบคุณค่ะ
  • I-NO's #1 Boyfriend for giving us permission to use his oc Olivia
  • Naninovel | Visual Novel Engine
  • All of you who interest in this

If you have any problem running this game, please contact me at Email or Twitter DM for support
